name: The Rock (MegaManBK7)
description:
Upon receiving a prophetic dream of an entire town's destruction, you must warn everybody of the danger. But convincing everyone that there is danger is harder than you might think.

This game was made a class project for Experimental Narrative at Georgia Tech, from the Chapin Champions. The theme was to adapt a song to a different media form, so we used "The Rock" by Harry Chapin.
